comments.body:
I am not sure what the status of MaxPool and MaxPoolV2 is, but my guess is that MaxPoolV2 is the one more commonly used now. You may want to also add that gradient https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/86d9171b006a2f4a65055228aa13d83d60916052/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_grad.py#L545

If you feel like it you can add MaxPoolGradGrad and MaxPoolGradGradV2, but I doubt these are blocking your models.
Ah, didn't know about MaxPoolV2. Added it.
